title: BoE flags risk of recession and 10% inflation as it raises rates again
content:
1. BoE flags risk of recession and 10% inflation as it raises rates again  Reuters.com
  2. Bank of England hikes interest rates to 13-year high, sees inflation hitting 10%  CNBC
  3. Watch live: Bank of England holds news conference as interest rate raised to 1%  Sky News
  4. Euro zone yields extend fall after BoE flags recession risk  Reuters.com
  5. British pound plummets as Bank of England warns of recession risk  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
